akn:section.akn:heading: Study of the effects of size and complexity of financial institutions on capital market efficiency a

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Report Not later than the end of the 180-day period beginning on July 21, 2010, and not later than every 5 years thereafter, the Chairperson shall issue a report to the Congress containing any findings and determinations made in carrying out the study required under subsection (a).
